title: Maylston & Menshɔn - Ɔrbital Tɛmpl
heading: Maylston & Menshɔn dɛn
description: Dis art wok we dɛn dɔn du fɔ bɔku ia na pat pan di 13th Mercosul Bienal na Porto Alegre, Brazil, we Marcelo Dantas bin kia fɔ. I dɔn de na di lɔng list fɔ di Lumen Prayz 2022 - Futures Awod. I dɔn win bak di ArtSat Kategori fɔ di CubeDesign 2021 kɔmpitishɔn, we di Brazilian Instityut fɔ Spays Risach (INPE) dɔn promot.

imageAlts.mercosul: Mercosur Biɛnal we dɛn kin gɛt
